message.content:
cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.DS, cs.HC. 

The paper deals with machine learning techniques for sales forecasting, which falls under the category of artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The use of Monte Carlo simulations to generate explanations for large errors in predictions suggests a focus on machine learning and data analysis (cs.LG, cs.DS). The evaluation of the algorithm through a user study indicates a human-computer interaction (cs.HC) component. Finally, the application of the technique to a real dataset from a retail company suggests a focus on information retrieval (cs.IR).
